tool_description: An API showing all the latest Crypto News
name: Crypto Updates Live
title: Crypto Updates Live

api_list.name: Get All news
api_list.description: Gets all the news related to Cryptocurrency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-updates-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-updates-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-updates-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-updates-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
